Reviews.Title: Sony cyber-shot hx300
Reviews.Author: Casper
Reviews.Content: I did agonizing research on all point and shoot cameras with high zoom capabilities and after a few false starts of the one I thought I wanted I found this one and fell in love it is rare to find a high zoom camera with as many mega pixels as this has. the image stabilization is good up to 50 times zoom but as expected going in to digital zoom the pic gets a little grainy but not unusable it would be wise to use the tripod that comes in this kit just because at full length the hand shakes enough to make pics a little blurry. buy the kit. the camera retails at $499.00 but for $20 bucks more you get some useful stuff. as for the company the camera ships from I am absolutely smitten it got here the day it said it would and the packaging was flawless every attempt to protect your purchase is made and it was a day or two from order to shipment very pleased with the whole process and of course my knew camera ;) happy pictures every one.

Reviews.Title: Go For It
Reviews.Author: Dennis
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera, takes beautiful, crisp photos. It's not too complicated yet enough features to play with.  Lots of extras on the deal and well worth the price.  Shipped promptly and complete.

Reviews.Title: It's very nice.
Reviews.Author: wangyanjiao
Reviews.Content: Although Memory Card Reader can't work a the beginning, but it doesn't matter.The picture is clear.I like it very much.

Reviews.Title: Nice Digital Camera Pack
Reviews.Author: Aselaherath
Reviews.Content: I always like Sony products, world famous company, superb finishingI have gone through "Cameta camera" b4 purchasing and it is leading seller in united state

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Linda Houston
Reviews.Content: Well balanced in hand, excellent zoom, used for about 1 month, replaces my ancient Pentax Sport and Sony pocket digital.

Reviews.Title: review
Reviews.Author: edison ferney ortiz
Reviews.Content: It will be simply, if you are not sure about wich the high zoom camera you want to buy (canon sx50 - sony hx300) choose this camera! It's is much better than i thought, you will not regret, anyway if i had a better english i'd tell you guys everything about how much i liked this camera. Gracias!

Reviews.Title: sometimes pictures terrible!!,I don't know Why.
Reviews.Author: Ki MyongLim
Reviews.Content: Satisfied with 50x zoom function,but sometimes pictures come out terrible even if I use auto mode with tripod.Please show me how to improve it.

<4> Spare NP-BX1 Battery for Sony + <5> Battery Charger for NP-BX1 + <6> Zeikos 50" Compact Tripod +
<7> Precision Design 55mm 3pc (UV/FLD/CPL) Filter Kit + <8> Precision Design SDHC Memory Card Reader + <9> HDMI to Micro-HDMI Cable (6') +
<10> Precision Design 5pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <11> Precision Design Memory Card Storage Wallet + <12> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors + <13> Image Recovery Software
ProductInfo.Name: Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-HX300 Digital Camera (Black) with 32GB Card + Battery & Charger + Case + Tripod + 3 Filters + HDMI Cable + Accessory Kit
